entities.name: knight
entities.description: The knight is described as yelling and popping his head into paintings. He is also mentioned to be running through pictures ahead.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people climbing the spiral staircase with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people climbing the spiral staircase with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people climbing the spiral staircase with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is mentioned as a knight who appears in paintings and gives advice to his comrades-in-arms.

entities.name: monks
entities.description: The monks are described as sinister-looking and appear in a painting.

entities.name: women
entities.description: A group of women in crinolines is mentioned to be alarmed by the knight's appearance.

relationships.description: The knight appears in a painting with sinister-looking monks.
The knight interacts with a group of women in crinolines, causing them to be alarmed.
